turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Operation Sheridan Sabre.
turn.1: What was the result of the Operation Sheridan Sabre?
turn.2: Although the landing zone showed no signs of PAVN activity the company came under heavy B-40 rocket, 82m mortar, .51 caliber machine gun, automatic and small arms fire.
turn.4: In addition, the PAVN employed command detonated mines.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Airstrikes, aerial rocket artillery and artillery support enabled the company to repulse a number of ground attacks by the estimated battalion size force.
turn.8: Company A, 2/7th Cavalry air assaulted into the landing zone to reinforce Company D. The contact broke after more than five hours of fierce battle.
turn.10: US losses were 24 killed and 1 missing, while PAVN losses were unknown.
turn.12: Sergeant John Noble Holcomb would be posthumously awarded the Medal of Honor for his actions in this battle.
